title: Elo correction
body: Who can I contact about having my elo corrected to fit my rank? Have climbed from b5 to b1 and have no doubt I can get to silver but I'm sick to death of having b4 and even b5's in my games.

replies.body: I would advise duo queuing with a mid silver or low gold player for a few games. If you guys can pull out one or two wins in a row, that should bring up your matchmaking score or at least lower the variance if you recently climbed from a much lower position than your current elo.
That's easy, just buy a majority shareholding in tencent. You're good to go now.
